product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant jewelry banner showcases a luxurious and feminine design, perfect for promoting high-end accessories. The layout is organized into two halves: the left side featuring informative text and the right side highlighting the product image. The top-left corner includes bold headlines indicated by `heading_1` and `heading_2`, followed by a refined serif `subheading` for the product name. A graceful quote is presented using `slogan`, and brand identity is emphasized through the stylized `tagline`. Below, `description` lists product features in bullet points. Pricing is displayed with strong emphasis via `price`, and a rounded rectangle `cta_background` encloses the bold call-to-action `cta`.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Blush (#FFF5F7)
- Rosy Pink (#FFECF0)
- Light Rose (#F8D7DC)
- Warm Petal (#F5C4CA)
- Dusty Rose (#FFD1D9)
- Deep Ruby (#C23152)
- Antique Mauve (#96344B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases elegant, floral-inspired earrings with a refined color palette dominated by soft rose gold (#F4A7B9) and sparkling crystal white (#FFFFFF). The rose gold forms the base and outlines, delivering a warm and luxurious look, while seamlessly blending with pink undertones (#FAD2D7) in the petal-like accents. The crystals are strategically placed for contrast and highlight, reflecting light to enhance vibrancy and create depth. Hints of light peach (#F8C7C7) are also visible, softening the metallic shine. Together, these colors create a harmonious, feminine aesthetic ideal for a banner background that’s both elegant and attention-grabbing.
